website_summaries.verdict: This is a premium mix of delicious proteins and fruits that your sugar glider will love to eat, and you’ll feel good knowing that this natural meal contains all of the essential nutrition it needs to thrive.
pros: Soybean meal, apple, and beet pulp are the first 3 ingredients
Features flavorful and healthy ingredients like bee pollen, raspberries, and golden raisins
cons: This recipe is fairly expensive, but it’s loaded with so many high-end ingredients, it isn’t a surprise

customer_reviews.title: Not bad...
customer_reviews.text: Although not a complete diet, my glider likes it. I have tried to feed my glider several different dried foods. She is very picky. Inside, there are large bits of dried fruit that I cut down to size. Large pieces of dried fruit cause problems with a gliders diet and increase fighting between gliders and I am surprised the company doesn't know better. In addition to the dry food, I also need to give her a vitamin supplement or she starts loosing her hair. I have had my glider for 6 years.
customer_reviews.author: Greenfest

customer_reviews.title: I find the gliders waste about 60 percent of it
customer_reviews.text: I find the gliders waste about 60 percent of it,,,they throw it out of the food container,,,Im looking to see if I can find any food they prefer to eat. Surely there is some brand that they love...
customer_reviews.author: Bobtenn

customer_reviews.title: My favorite sugar glider food.
customer_reviews.text: Best food for my sugar glider. It's the only brand that I feel that they actually eat and enjoy, also it's healthy for them.
customer_reviews.author: Molly Tiernan

customer_reviews.title: My Boys approve
customer_reviews.text: 1st of all, This isnt the main meal for my gliders! This is just a snack for them to enjoy and have access to it throughout the day/night. Okay, so now that is over. I love this food! And so does my boys! This is better then the other dry pellets I was given them the dried fruit is all over!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Good pellet
customer_reviews.text: I had to buy a bird food dispenser so they dont throw it around so much but my gliders like these pellets. I noticed ever since I added this to their diet that their fur looks better.
customer_reviews.author: Lexie

customer_reviews.title: Good Stuff.
customer_reviews.text: Our Gliders love this mix and it really does help keep our pets healthy.
customer_reviews.author: Darrell See

customer_reviews.title: Sugarglider dream come true
customer_reviews.text: Our sugargliders love the little chunks of dried fruit intermingled with the pellets.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Might be good, but I have the pickiest sugar glider ever!
customer_reviews.text: Might be good, but I have the pickiest sugar glider ever!
customer_reviews.author: theresa

customer_reviews.title: Gliders won't eat it
customer_reviews.text: My sugar gliders won't eat it and they eat just about anything.
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: Waste has no offensive smell
customer_reviews.text: Gliders really like this stuff and I like the fact their cage doesn't have an offensive smell due to their waste.
customer_reviews.author: SHARON

customer_reviews.title: my sugar gliders loves it
customer_reviews.text: they eat all of their food, and their poop looks normal
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Sugar Gliders
customer_reviews.text: I am excited that I came across this food for my sugar gliders and chipmunk. This is less of a problem than what I was feeding them.
customer_reviews.author: PAM SITTON

customer_reviews.title: yum food, perfect for my pet
customer_reviews.text: perfect food,my little pet really love to eat. So this time I brought 5lbs for her.
customer_reviews.author: joanna

customer_reviews.title: Sugar gliders love it!
customer_reviews.text: My sugar gliders love it! I only use the pellets along with the food I prepare myself (I do believe a homemade diet is the best route) and then use the dried fruit in the bag as a snack sparingly. It works just great though.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Great food they love
customer_reviews.text: This is the only kibble type food I feed my sugar gliders. They both love it.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great food for Gliders
customer_reviews.text: My little sugar gliders love this food and it's a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Tracy G B

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: They love the fruits but always eat d pellets last but they still do.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Glides seem to love the food. Prompt shipping but insanely expensive!!!!! $30 for 5 pounds!?!
customer_reviews.author: Mimi's Custom Creations

customer_reviews.title: As is says Complete Diet for my Sugar Gliders.
customer_reviews.text: only Sugar Glider food I buy and they love it.
customer_reviews.author: earthangel561

customer_reviews.title: I got half a bag of air. Definitely not ...
customer_reviews.text: I got half a bag of air. Definitely not as much fruit inside as the picture makes it look too, which is the part my sugar gliders want to eat the most.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Healthy for sugar gliders
customer_reviews.text: There could be less pellets and more of the other foods combined but my gliders enjoy it so far.
customer_reviews.author: Nicolle

customer_reviews.title: This is mostly the pellets with a couple of pieces ...
customer_reviews.text: This is mostly the pellets with a couple of pieces of dried fruit inside. I would say 98% pellets though, which isn't what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: T.

customer_reviews.title: Looks good in the package but my Gliders won't eat it
customer_reviews.text: Looks good in the package but my Gliders won't eat it. They just throw it around the cage. Probably depends on how picky your Glider is.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Sugar Glider Food
customer_reviews.text: This sugar glider food is the best. It contains treats mixed in with it and the sugar bears run to their dish every time I give the more. If you ever had a hard time to get your sugar gliders to eat their regular pellets, this food is the one. I had this issue but not anymore with this food because my sugar gliders love the surprises in it. This food has taken away my anxiety of getting them to eat the pellets. I have orderd a small bag before but this time I purchased the 5 lb bag because they love it.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Gliders like it, but waste 1/2!
customer_reviews.text: For some reason my gliders eat the middle of the pellets and not the ends? So we end up wasting a bit of it. I'm glad that they do eat what they do though, because it takes the stress out of hand balancing their diet. It doesn't have a ton of the dried fruit but thats okay because we do feed them fruits daily anyway. Amazon is a bit more expensive than the brands actual website, which is a bummer because I love the fast shipping and no minimum purchase for free shipping!
customer_reviews.author: AndyGirl

customer_reviews.title: They do need fresh food also
customer_reviews.text: I use this food and every other day give them dried mealworms and fresh fruit and veggies grinded mixture with bee pollen they been on this diet over a year now and happy healthy active lil guys .
customer_reviews.author: Momof5

customer_reviews.title: They love the fruit bits and the meat bits
customer_reviews.text: My gliders eat it reluctantly. They love the fruit bits and the meat bits. Seems there has got to be a better tasting pellet out there that they will love to eat. Thinking of trying Pocket Pets Glider Chow. Any opinions?
customer_reviews.author: mcloutier55

customer_reviews.title: Not for this glider!
customer_reviews.text: The pellets are hard and while there are chunks of dried fruit in it, my Hercules has no interest in it. I have used other pelleted food and he would it that bit he has zero interest in glider complete. It may be nutritionally sound which is why I bought it and gavw it a 3 star rating but not very tasty it seems.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: easy to find
customer_reviews.text: Great for new sugar glider owners who are finding out what is best for them
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: They love it but leaves a scent
customer_reviews.text: My sugar gliders love it but it does make their cage smellier than other foods they’ve been on.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Crespo

product_meta.title: Glider Complete - Healthy High Protein Nutritionally Complete Staple Diet Sugar Glider Food
product_meta.description:
Size:5 lb.

Exotic Nutrition's Glider Complete is a nutritionally fortified pellet, along with 8 varieties of real fruit chunks.

FEATURES:
✔ ALL-NATURAL - 100% natural - no artificial colors, flavors, or preservatives
✔ EASY - offer your Sugar glider a varied diet that contains high animal proteins and fruits without the hassle of mixing and cutting.
✔ NUTRITIOUS - combines a high-protein pellet with the correct amount of vitamins and minerals to give your Sugar Glider exactly what is needed for proper growth and development.
✔ COMPLETE - Additional vitamin & mineral supplements are not required when glider's diet is made up of 75% Glider Complete
✔ RECOMMENDED - Glider Complete is veterinarian approved.
✔ VARIETY - In addition to nutrient-dense pellets, Glider Complete also includes a variety of dried fruit that Gliders love.
✔ HIGH QUALITY - made in small batches to ensure consistent quality

STORAGE: Storing in refrigerator is highly advised. Store bag in a cool, dry place (under 70 degrees), in a sealed, air-tight container. It is recommended to store the bag of food in the refrigerator, taking out enough food for a week at a time in airtight container, and then refilling that container with the refrigerated food. Do not frequently expose food to a freeze/thaw cycle. If storing bag for longer than 8 weeks, refrigerate (up to 6 months). If storing for longer than 6 months, freeze (up to 12 months).

GUARANTEED ANALYSIS: Crude protein (min) 31.5% crude fat (min) 3.5% salt (max) 1.4% crude fiber (max) 3.6 % moisture (max) 13.5% calcium (min) 1.83% calcium (max) 2.3 % phosphorous (min) 1.16 vitamin a (min) 10,000 iu/lb
feature_bullets: ✔ ALL-NATURAL - 100% natural - no artificial colors, flavors, or preservatives
✔ EASY - offer your Sugar glider a varied diet that contains high animal proteins and fruits without the hassle of mixing and cutting.
✔ NUTRITIOUS - combines a high-protein pellet with the correct amount of vitamins and minerals to give your Sugar Glider exactly what is needed for proper growth and development.
✔ COMPLETE - Additional vitamin & mineral supplements are not required when glider's diet is made up of 75% Glider Complete

✔ FAST, FREE SHIPPING in USA! Avg 3 days! ZooPro sells exotic animal food and accessories that are manufactured by Exotic Nutrition Pet Supply Company. Exotic Nutrition has been the industry leader of exotic animal products since 1998, specializing in sugar gliders, hedgehogs, prairie dogs, marmosets, degus, skunks, opossums, chinchillas, rats, hamsters, gerbils, squirrels, rabbits, guinea pigs, rodents, ferrets, chickens, bluebirds, wild birds, monkeys, marsupials, reptiles, amphibians & more
